TopicTitle: My first Helicopterrocket-SSTO to Duna... and back to kerbin

Articles.Content:
After a week of designing and testing I finally came up with a working for a SSTD!
I made Single stage to Duna vessel with ISRU capabilities.

Here are its specs:
- Weight: 127 tonnes (wet) / 37 tonnes (dry)
- Delta v budget: 4900 m/s
- Rocket engines: 2 vectors, 1 nuke
- Helicopter: 2 large shift-able motors with 8 propellers each.

I had a blast designing the craft. I'm not a SSTO kind of guy, which made this mission extra challenging. I also made a small video of the mission:
